original_text: So Philip started on his journey. While he was going along this road, he met an important officer from Ethiopia. This man had authority over the queen of Ethiopia's money. The queen was called Candace. The officer was travelling home from Jerusalem. He had been there to worship God.
korean_text: 일어나 가서 보니 에디오피아 사람 곧 에디오피아 여왕 간다게의 모든 국고를 맡은 관리인 내시가 예배하러 예루살렘에 왔다가

sentences.original_text: So Philip started on his journey.
While he was going along this road,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 길을 따라 가는 동안,

sentences.original_text: he met an important officer from Ethiopia.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 에티오피아에서 온 중요한 장교를 만났습니다.

sentences.original_text: This man had authority over the queen of Ethiopia's money.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 남자는 에티오피아 여왕의 돈에 대한 권위를 가졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: The officer was travelling home from Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 장교는 예루살렘에서 집으로 가고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He had been there to worship God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님을 경배하기 위해 그곳에 있었습니다.
